name: Dragapult
description: The Stealth Pokémon. When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, this Pokémon may roll 1d4. On a result of 4, the opponent who made the attack cannot use the same move on its next turn.
